titles.title: Hello My Name Is Child Of The One True King

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Whoa oh ah oh ah oh oh (ah oh), Whoa oh ah oh ah oh oh (ah oh),
Whoa oh ah oh ah oh oh

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hello, my name is regret - I'm pretty sure we have met
Every single day of your life - I'm the whisper inside
That won't let you forget

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hello, my name is defeat - I know you recognize me
Just when you think you can win - I'll drag you right back down again
'Til you've lost all belief

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh, these are the voices. Oh, these are the lies
And I have believed them for the very last time

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hello, my name is child of the one true King
I've been saved, I've been changed, I have been set free
"Amazing Grace" is the song I sing
Hello, my name is child of the one true King

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Whoa oh ah oh ah oh oh
Whoa oh ah oh ah oh oh
Whoa oh ah oh ah oh oh

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I am no longer defined - By all the wreckage behind
The one who makes all things new - Has proven it's true
Just take a look at my life

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
What love the Father has lavished upon us
that we should be called His children
I am a child of the one true King
